citation: Proclamation under the Local Government (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2013 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Local Government (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2013

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2(2) of the Local Government (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2013 fix 7 February 2014 as the day on which Part 4 of that Act commences.

3 February 2014

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Local Government

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 5 February 2014

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
